title: شرح عقيدة مالك الصغير ابن أبي زيد القيرواني
author: القاضي عبد الوهاب بن نصر البغدادي
description:
This book is one of the most important commentaries on the Introduction of Ibn Abî Zayd al-Qayrawânî al Maliki (386 AH) and a great enlightenment; indeed, its authors were among the greatest Maliki scholars. The first is Ibn Abi Zaid, whose name is Malik as-Saghir, the author of the Matn ; and the second is Abu Muhammad Abd al-Wahhab al-Baghdadi al-Maliki, a great scholar and one of the most prominent Maliki jurists of his time (422H).
This valuable book is offered to you by the Muhammadiyah Association of Scholars in Morocco, with Tahqiq of the text and footnotes on selected points and on the Hadiths.
